home.missionStatement: Bridges For Peace: Christians supporting Israel and building relationships between Christians and Jews in Israel and around the world.
home.noCodeDialog: If you are a new immigrant looking for a welcome gift we are currently experiencing an overwhelming volume of requests. Unfortunately, we cannot offer new immigrants welcome gifts at this time. Please do not leave a message as we cannot reply to your message. In the future, we hope to distribute these gifts again through absorption centers and other community organizations.

error.too_big: The value length exceeds the limit

common.wantToSubmit: Do you want to submit the form?

immigrant.title: New Immigrant Gift Application
immigrant.subtitle: If you have made aliyah within the last six months and would like to receive a blanket, pots & pans and kitchen utensils, please complete the form below. We will contact you with more details.

attachmentLabel: Please upload a clear picture of your Teudat Oleh from:

address2.title: Address Line 2(optional)
address2.placeholder: Apartment, suite, unit, building, floor, etc.

aliyahContent: When did you come into the country?

whereHeardOfUs.title: Where did you hear about us?

fac.title: Student Enrichment Scholarship Application
fac.subtitle: Instructions: Application must include a clear head and shoulder picture of the student. Photos that are tilted, have filters, masks, or have hands or headphones shown, will NOT be accepted.
fac.thankYou: Thank you for submitting the application

elementary.instruction: Each student or parent should fill in their own answers.
elementary.name: Name
elementary.isFirstTime: Is this your first time applying for the scholarship?
elementary.q1: How many members are there in your family?
elementary.q2: How many brothers do you have?
elementary.q3: How many sisters do you have?
elementary.archive_q6: What is your favorite subject in school?
elementary.q7: What do you like about your family?
elementary.q9: School subjects I have difficulties in:
elementary.q10: What I like about my teacher and why:
elementary.q11: What my teacher says about me:
elementary.loveMost: What I love most in this world:
elementary.check1: I understand that I will need to write a thank you to the donors of the scholarship.
elementary.check2: I agree to the use of my photo by Bridges for Peace for the advancement of the scholarship program.
elementary.forTeacher1: For the Teacher: Please describe the family situation if possible.
elementary.forTeacher2: For the Teacher: Please describe the school situation for the child.

highschool.introduction: Introduce yourself and describe your family. Include how many siblings you have, and/or who you live with, and how long your family has been in Israel.
highschool.school: What is school like for you? What are you good at and what is challenging?
highschool.personalLife: What do you like to do in your free time? What are some of your favorite things?
highschool.yourFuture: What do you want to do for a career? What dreams do you have? How do you see yourself in 10 years?
highschool.scholarship: Why do you want this scholarship?
